word_mean: 恶病质：沉重的、显著的体质疾病，全身健康和营养状况不良

sentence.Network_en: However, he developed progressive cachexia, withdrew from hemodialysis and subsequently died.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而他发展成恶病质, 停止血液透析,结果死亡.

sentence.Network_en: IL - 1 , IL - 6 , and TNF - ain cachexia patients with different syndromes were examined.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时,对现在住院的患者选择不同辨证分型的恶病质病人检测IL -1 、 IL -6, TNF - α.

sentence.Network_en: He did not receive any further treatment and he died 8 months later of tumour cachexia.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有接受任何进一步的治疗,8个月后因肿瘤引起的恶病质死亡.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 恶病质（cachexia）一词来源于希腊语的“kakos”和“hexis”，字面意思是“恶劣的状况”。它可发生于多种疾病，包括肿瘤、 AIDS、严重 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via late Latin from Greek kakhexia, from kakos 'bad' + hexis 'habit'

means.word_mean: 1. any general reduction in vitality and strength of body and mind resulting from a debilitating chronic disease

auth_sentence.content: This is called cachexia and is difficult to reverse.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is called cachexia and is difficult to reverse.

auth_sentence.content: Loss of appetite or anorexia is often associated with cachexia, especially cachexia of malignancy.
